text.tspan: Our goal : load bone data from a COLLADA file exported by the BlenderCollada script.
- Rotation as a Unit Quaternion (x, y, z, w)

flowRoot.flowPara: BlenderCollada exports only bone root positions.
If node has no child, we cannot find out its angle, so we set it
We compute vectors by subtracting points
From what we see, the easiest solution to get the angle is to compute it in axis-angle.
The axis angle is easy too :
Then, we have to convert to quaternion :
